item.text: When Jesus had finished instructing his 12 disciples, he went on from there to teach and preach in their towns.
Now when John heard in prison about the deeds Christ had done, he sent his disciples to ask a question:

“<st data-num="1510" class="">Are</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3588">the one who</st> is to <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> should we <st data-num="4328" class="">look</st> for <st data-num="2087" class="">another</st>?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="4198">Go</st> <st data-num="518" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> you <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="991" class="">see:</st><n id="2" />

The <st data-num="5185" class="">blind</st> <st data-num="308" class="">see</st>, the<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5560" class="">lame</st> <st data-num="4043" class="">walk</st>, <st data-num="3015" class="">lepers</st><n id="2" /> are <st data-num="2511" class="">cleansed</st>, the <st data-num="2974" class="">deaf</st> <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st>, the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st> are <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4434" class="">poor</st> have <st data-num="2027">good news proclaimed</st> to them<n id="3" />
—and blessed is anyone who takes no offense at me!”
While they were going away, Jesus began to speak to the crowd about John: “What did you go out into the wilderness to see? A reed shaken by the wind?

<st data-num="5101" class="">What</st><n id="1" /> did you <st data-num="1831">go out</st> to <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st>? A <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="294" class="">dressed</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3120">soft clothing</st>?<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2400" class="">Look</st>, those who <st data-num="5409" class="">wear</st> <st data-num="3120">soft clothing</st> are <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3624">palaces</st> of <st data-num="935" class="">kings</st>!<n id="3" />

<st data-num="5101" class="">What</st> did you <st data-num="1831" class="">go out</st> to <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st>? A <st data-num="4396" class="">prophet</st>? <st data-num="3483" class="">Yes</st>, I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4053">more</st><n id="1" /> than a <st data-num="4396" class="">prophet</st>!

This is the one about whom it is written:

“‘Look, I am sending my messenger ahead of you,

who will prepare your way before you.’
“I tell you the truth, among those born of women, no one has arisen greater than John the Baptist. Yet the one who is least in the kingdom of heaven is greater than he is!

<st data-num="575" class="">From</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> of <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st> the <st data-num="910" class="">Baptist</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">until</st> <st data-num="737" class="">now</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> has <st data-num="971">suffered violence</st>,<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="973">forceful people</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="726">lay hold</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>.

<st data-num="1063">For</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> <st data-num="4395" class="">prophesied</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">until</st> <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st> appeared.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> you are <st data-num="2309" class="">willing</st> to <st data-num="1209" class="">accept</st> it,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="1510">is</st> <st data-num="2243" class="">Elijah</st>, who <st data-num="3195" class="">is</st> to <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st>.
The one who has ears had better listen!
“To what should I compare this generation? They are like children sitting in the marketplaces who call out to one another,

“‘We played the flute for you, yet you did not dance;

we wailed in mourning, yet you did not weep.’
For John came neither eating nor drinking, and they say, ‘He has a demon!’
The Son of Man came eating and drinking, and they say, ‘Look at him, a glutton and a drunk, a friend of tax collectors and sinners!’ But wisdom is vindicated by her deeds.”
Then Jesus began to criticize openly the cities in which he had done many of his miracles because they did not repent.

“<st data-num="3759" class="">Woe</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="5523" class="">Chorazin</st>!<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3759" class="">Woe</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="966" class="">Bethsaida</st>! <st data-num="1487" class="">If</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="1411" class="">miracles</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1096" class="">done</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> had been <st data-num="1096" class="">done</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5184" class="">Tyre</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4605" class="">Sidon</st>,<n id="5" /> they would have <st data-num="3340" class="">repented</st> <st data-num="3819">long ago</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4526">sackcloth</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4700">ashes</st>.<n id="6" />

<st data-num="4133" class="">But</st> I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, it will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="414">more bearable</st> for <st data-num="5184" class="">Tyre</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4605" class="">Sidon</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> of <st data-num="2920" class="">judgment</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">than</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>!

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="2584">Capernaum</st>,<n id="1" /> will you be <st data-num="5312" class="">exalted</st> <st data-num="2193">to</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>?<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3361" class="">No</st>, you will be <st data-num="2597">thrown down</st> <st data-num="2193">to</st> <st data-num="86" class="">Hades</st>!<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> the <st data-num="1411" class="">miracles</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">done</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> had been <st data-num="1096" class="">done</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4670" class="">Sodom</st>,<n id="4" /> it would have <st data-num="3306" class="">continued</st> <st data-num="3360" class="">to</st> this <st data-num="4594" class="">day</st>.<n id="5" />
But I tell you, it will be more bearable for the region of Sodom on the day of judgment than for you!”
At that time Jesus said, “I praise you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, because you have hidden these things from the wise and intelligent, and have revealed them to little children.

<st data-num="3483" class="">Yes</st>, <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3779" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">was</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2107">gracious will</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="3956">All things</st> have been <st data-num="3860">handed over</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3762">No one</st> <st data-num="1921" class="">knows</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> <st data-num="1508">except</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>, <st data-num="3761">and no</st> <st data-num="5100">one</st> <st data-num="1921" class="">knows</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="1508">except</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">anyone</st> to <st data-num="3739">whom</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> <st data-num="1014" class="">decides</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="601" class="">reveal</st> him.

<st data-num="1205" class="">Come</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> you who are <st data-num="2872" class="">weary</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5412" class="">burdened</st>, <st data-num="2504">and I</st> will give <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="373" class="">rest</st>.

<st data-num="142" class="">Take</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="2218" class="">yoke</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3129" class="">learn</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="4239" class="">gentle</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5011" class="">humble</st> in <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you will <st data-num="2147" class="">find</st> <st data-num="372" class="">rest</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">souls</st>.
For my yoke is easy to bear, and my load is not hard to carry.”
